metadata.title: CVE-2024-36921 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:iwlwifi: mvm: guard against invalid STA ID on removal Guard against invalidstation IDs in iwl_mvm_mld_rm_sta_id as that would result in out-of-boundsarray accesses. This prevents issues should the driver get into a bad stateduring error handling.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
